survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Electric Vehicle (EV) Public Charging Stations Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction with public charging stations for electric vehicles (EVs) to identify areas for improvement and enhance user experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: This question helps segment users based on frequency of use. Consider using a single-choice radio button for clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a public EV charging station? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: This question helps prioritize features for improvement. Use checkboxes for multi-selection.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a public EV charging station? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the reliability of public EV charging stations (i.e., chargers working as expected)?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the reliability of public EV charging stations (i.e., chargers working as expected)?

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using public EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice with an open-ended 'Other' option to capture additional challenges.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced when using public EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the ease of payment at public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Likert scale question to assess payment process satisfaction.

script.question_text: How would you rate the ease of payment at public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for public EV charging stations?
